text: Guillon-Terre-Plaine is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Yonne department in central France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2019 and consists of the former communes of Guillon (the seat), Cisery, Sceaux, Trévilly and Vignes.Arrêté préfectoral 24 December 2018 == References == * INSEE Category:2019 establishments in France Category:Communes in Yonne
title: Guillon-Terre-Plaine
